document.full_text: employment steadily improved in most states in march, and jobless rates dipped in states that had posted record highs just a few months ago, according to government data released on tuesday.
document.title: in most states, job markets show signs of life
lines_and_colors: employment steadily improved in most states in march, and jobless rates dipped in states that had posted record highs just a few months ago, according to government data released on tuesday.
